handler

Class RangeResponder

  • java.lang.Object
    • handler.RangeResponder

  • public class RangeResponder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class check range request header and check resource which is fit for range. After that, send proper response.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Younjin Hwang

    • Method Detail

      • doRange

        public Response doRange(Request request)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This method gets full contents of resource and check with range header. Then, send right response.
        Parameters:
        request - the object that made with client input at socket
        Returns:
        response object for client output
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when request is null
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        Request.getResourcePath(), FileContentConverter.getFullContents(File), getRangePart(Request), getRangeLimits(byte[], String), Response.setContentTypeHeader(ContentType), ResourceTypeIdentifier.getType(File)
